name: Araf (pholsen)
description:
Araf is a 2D Platform game which uses two different spaces as a puzzle. Our goal is to try to find the door by going back and forth in two different worlds. Bending the spaces instead of jumping is the biggest weapon of our main character. 

Controls 

Movement - A D 

Changing worlds – Space 

Passing through the door – F 

Rotating the map – E Q
